title: Create Multiple Files with Dataset Fanouts

questions.question: Which of these scenarios would benefit from using a dataset fanout?
options: You want to automatically email the results of your workspace to a colleague after it runs.
You want to create a zipped file containing multiple Excel workbooks.
You want to update several tables in a database at once based on one stream of features.
You want to write out features to a single table in a geodatabase.

questions.question: Dataset fanouts are set via the writer parameters in the Navigator.
You can set a feature type and a dataset fanout on the same writer.
